short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily generate embed codes to display your Google Photos and Picasa Web Albums content on your blog or elsewhere.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Free for a limited time!

Embedder lets you select and order photos from Google Photos or Picasa Web Albums and generate HTML embed code so you can easily place those images on your blog or website. You have full control of the image sizes and other metadata so you can generate exactly the HTML desired.
